abstract: General Electric said Friday that its second-quarter earnings tumbled 49 percent on the continued woes of its finance unit and ongoing weakness in its big industrial units due to the recession.
snippet: General Electric said Friday that its second-quarter earnings tumbled 49 percent on the continued woes of its finance unit and ongoing weakness in its big industrial units due to the recession.
lead_paragraph: General Electric said Friday that its second-quarter earnings tumbled 49 percent on the continued woes of its finance unit and ongoing weakness in its big industrial units due to the recession.

headline.main: G.E. Reports a 17% Decline in Revenue
